thread.title: Paladin Data Systems Corporation to Present SMARTGov(TM) at ICC's 2015 Building Safety & Design Expo, September 27-29, 2015, in Long Beach, CA
thread.title_full: Paladin Data Systems Corporation to Present SMARTGov(TM) at ICC's 2015 Building Safety & Design Expo, September 27-29, 2015, in Long Beach, CA

title: Paladin Data Systems Corporation to Present SMARTGov(TM) at ICC's 2015 Building Safety & Design Expo, September 27-29, 2015, in Long Beach, CA
text:
Learning & Support Paladin Data Systems Corporation to Present SMARTGov(TM) at ICC's 2015 Building Safety & Design Expo, September 27-29, 2015, in Long Beach, CA Community Development software to be showcased to over 6,000 building safety and design professionals at the annual conference. September 22, 2015 12:29 ET | Source: Paladin Data Systems 
POULSBO, Wash., Sept. 22, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Paladin Data Systems Corporation announced today it will present its community development software SMARTGov, at International Code Council's (ICC) 2015 Building Safety & Design Expo, September 27-29, 2015, in Long Beach, CA. SMARTGov is Paladin's community development software solution that manages the full lifecycle of permits, inspections, licenses, and code enforcement activities for jurisdictions. "We're looking forward to the energetic atmosphere of the ICC conference and sharing in industry discussions. Over the last year, we have incorporated many new features into SMARTGov that are designed to drive efficiencies and support citizen expectations. This conference allows us to brag a little about all of our new SMARTGov 'toys'," said Jon Byrd, Paladin's SMARTGov Sales and Marketing Manager. "Paladin is working very hard to make SMARTGov the best government solution on the market. We are excited to present our new technology to over 6,000 ICC folks," said Jim Nall, Paladin CEO. ICC's Building Safety & Design Expo provides a platform for exhibitors to demonstrate and educate over 6,000 building safety and design professionals and the public about the latest products and services needed to keep buildings safe and meet and maintain compliance with accepted codes and standards. The expo will bring professionals from the building environment including software providers, local tradesmen, architects, engineers, and plumbing, mechanical, fuel gas, building and fire safety professionals from around the country together in one location. "Our free 30-day SMARTGov trial gives you a chance to test drive the system before buying. We will be offering this to those we meet at our booth #100." Building safety and design professionals will have the opportunity to experience the web-based features of SMARTGov through on-site demonstrations and even sign-up for a free 30-day trial of the community development software. About SMARTGov SMARTGov is a web-based software application developed by Paladin Data Systems to support community development functions including permitting, planning, inspections, code enforcement, licenses, fees, parcels, contractors and many others. SMARTGov is configurable, flexible, and interactive. It allows community development users the ability to prioritize projects, manage workflow, communicate with other departments, and work more efficiently. While typically deployed as a cloud-based service, SMARTGov can be deployed on-premise and gives both citizens and jurisdiction staff access to project data on the web 24/7. Paladin offers a 30-day trial of SMARTGov software at no cost or obligation. About Paladin Data Systems Corporation Paladin Data Systems (Paladin) is an award-winning software development company that provides advanced technology solutions for government and commercial sectors. Since 1994, Paladin has specialized in providing configurable, scalable software solutions that support government agency processes and operations, providing agencies and employees with the best technology tools available to better serve their communities. For more information about Paladin Data Systems and the full suite of products available, please visit www.PaladinData.com . Chris Andersen Marketing Manager Paladin Data Systems 19362 Powder Hill Place NE Poulsbo, WA 98370 360.394.3233 Related Articles other press releases by Paladin Data Systems
